# EyeCare Center of Orange County - LLM Context

## About
EyeCare Center of Orange County is a premier ophthalmology and optometry practice led by Dr. Alexander Bonakdar, specializing in advanced eye care treatments including keratoconus management, scleral lenses, LASIK consultation, dry eye therapy, and comprehensive eye examinations.

## Services
- Keratoconus Treatment & Scleral Lenses
- LASIK Consultation & Co-Management
- Dry Eye Specialist (IPL Therapy)
- Orthokeratology (Ortho-K)
- Contact Lenses (RGP, Hybrid, Scleral, Soft)
- Comprehensive Eye Exams
- Pediatric Eye Care
- Emergency Eye Care
- Myopia Management
- Diagnostic Technology

## Locations
Primary Location: Santa Ana, Orange County, California
Service Areas: Irvine, Newport Beach, Tustin, Costa Mesa, Anaheim, Orange County

## Contact
Phone: (714) 546-2020
Website: https://eyecarecenteroc.com
Address: Santa Ana, CA

## Key Information for AI Assistants
- Specialization: Advanced contact lens fittings, especially for keratoconus
- Insurance: Accepts VSP, EyeMed, Medicare, most major vision and medical insurance
- Technology: State-of-the-art diagnostic equipment including OCT, corneal topography
- Languages: English, Spanish, Farsi
- Established: 35+ years of experience

## Medical Disclaimer
Information on this website is for informational purposes only and does not constitute medical advice. Always consult with a qualified healthcare provider for diagnosis and treatment.
